description: Saves a copy of a database migration assessment report to your Amazon S3 bucket. DMS can save your assessment report as a comma-separated value (CSV) or a PDF file.

parameters.name: MigrationProjectIdentifier
parameters.description: The migration project name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: SelectionRules
parameters.description: A value that specifies the database objects to assess.

parameters.name: AssessmentReportTypes
parameters.description: The file format of the assessment file. (string) ---

nested_items.name: PdfReport
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 details for an assessment exported in PDF format.

nested_items.name: S3ObjectKey
nested_items.description: The object key for the object containing the exported metadata model assessment.

nested_items.name: ObjectURL
nested_items.description: The URL for the object containing the exported metadata model assessment.

nested_items.name: CsvReport
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 details for an assessment exported in CSV format.

nested_items.name: S3ObjectKey
nested_items.description: The object key for the object containing the exported metadata model assessment.

nested_items.name: ObjectURL
nested_items.description: The URL for the object containing the exported metadata model assessment.
